title: I think we are going about the karma changes wrong.
body:
Im excited about what is proposed/tested however I skeptical that it will make her good. Non e of the changes really solve any of her issues. 

I think a more simple solution is to simply increase the range of her Q and W by 10-20%. At the moment Karma is outranged by most midlaners and anyone with a dash can instantly get out of W fairly easily. 

Also Id be interested in exploring an option on her QR where it goes through minions which would allow it to not be blocked by that minion that is 5  ft to your right.
